title: [Dead Plateau, Cliff Side]
description: Small, dislodged rocks careen quickly down the side of the cliff, giving indication of what might happen should a misstep occur.  The night sky is filled with radiant moons and glittering stars in all except a few spots far to the west.  A few hardy weeds have taken up residence in the soil of a nearby crevice, but no insects clamber over or around them, and the silence is only disturbed by your own movements.

Small, dislodged rocks careen quickly down the side of the cliff, giving indication of what might happen should a misstep occur.  A few fluffy clouds drift in the blue sky far to the west, but otherwise the day is clear and bright.  A few hardy weeds have taken up residence in the soil of a nearby crevice, but no insects clamber over or around them, and the silence is only disturbed by your own movements.
